subject: Forget about paying for this..
body: Forget about paying for this...   As part of an insane marketing test,  I am giving away an in-depth Internet "Business-In-A-Box" I should be selling this for 497 Dollars, but... I''m flat out giving it away. Your cost is zero... zip... zilch! You probably think I''ve lost my mind - and maybe I have -  but just visit this site right now and in 5 minutes  you''ll have this awesome 497 Dollar Internet Business training kit as my gift to you. No kidding! Grab it quick - right now - before I change my mind...  Shawn  -------------------------------------------------- To stop receiving announcements Mining Gold Corporation 20533 Biscayne Boulevard, No. 484 Aventura, FL 33180
